snippet.title: I Added Drifting to My Racing Game (Apex Rush)
snippet.description:
Wishlist Apex Rush on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2638250/Apex_Rush/
I've been hard at work with my racing game Apex Rush, today I'll share some updates and new things that will be in the final release of the game!

Play the Apex Rush Demo here: https://realhazardous.itch.io/apex-rush

Tutorial on how to Download & Run the game: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V7all7Rzivg

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/mCZ59bDsFr

I hope you all enjoy this video & game. Drop a LIKE & Subscribe if you're new!
